title: Get a HOT deal on my favorite dry shampoo!
description: Grab a GREAT deal on my favorite Living Proof Shampoo! Living Proof is offering an exclusive deal to my followers! Order $50+ of any product on their site (except for the discounted gift sets) and use coupon code CRYSTALP and you’ll get 25% off any order + free shipping! Plus, if you order $85+, you’llRead More
author: Crystal Paine
